results.t: Meaning of plumber in English - Cambridge Dictionary
results.p: a person whose job is to supply and connect or repair water pipes, baths, toilets, etc.: When is the plumber coming to repair the burst pipe?
A plumber is someone whose job includes fixing pipes and installing water and sewage systems. If your kitchen sink is clogged, a plumber is the person to call.
